release.action: Take also terms of boolean sub queries into account.
Add facet capabilities, see springapp-servlet.xml for details (see plugDescriptionFacetCounter). This feature must be configured.
Fix problem in start script. Heap memory settings were not set correctly.
Fix bug with iplug, if a opensearch response item has no description tag.
Make boolean operator handling more consistent. Trailing spaces must be set in spring configuration to be able to support "-" and "NOT " equaly.
Updated start.sh, which had an issue when being batch-invoked, deleted RSYNC which is no longer used, see https://dev.wemove.com/jira/browse/INGRID-1885
Fixed inconsistency of setting of ranking parameter.
Added new pluggable ranking modification (linear modification of scores for BW).
Added support for AND, OR, NOT and phrases in searches.
Changed logging behavior, so that not so many files will be created.
Introduced new field "metainfo" in query for various control info to be handled by iBus / iPlugs.
Fix start script for running on Ubuntu.
